interaction.text: Tickets are way too expensive
Make same-day, different times flexible tickets more of an option. There are plenty of seats ...

Do better offers (more promotions, early bird offers etc), more ticket flexibility, better rewards for frequent travellers . Also: make mobile tickets with QR code available for bookings for more than 1 passenger.
When booking the seat numbers could show if it 's a 4 table seat or just a 2 seat . I did n't need a table but a little more leg room would have been perfect .

In Standard Magnum - formerly Leisure First - go back to the type and quality of meals you offered until about a year ago . The new food offering is second rate . We are frequent travellers using Quasigo for around 10 return journeys per annum and used to look forward to a decent breakfast going out and dinner on the return . No longer !

The service was so poor on the trip and the food was not delivered properly. Yet they did not give us all the food as the rest of the carriages and they claim it was not enough for all the passengers .

I am a Carte Blanche member and travel quite a bit - I love how convenient the service is . The trains could use some updating . The food is Standard Magnum is also very bad . However , I like the lounge and the 10 minute check in . Bring back free drinks in Standard Magnum ( with Champagne ) , please ! : )
More legroom and shorter , quieter and more targeted announcements .

Fast , friendly and efficient , also very good prices for travel booked in advanced . However , disappointed with food menu on train as we are vegetarian and vegan . Vegetarian options sold out and on vegan meals
Friendly guy for service ..he deserves promotion. Food was a bit average. This time train was running as scheduled , but too often delays. In general better than flying Allover ok to good

Cannot retrieve tickets at Moonport station with card or reference as it is not a Quasigo terminal - price paid for a single journey Moonport - Stars Bridge at 200$ and the train was overbooked. Slightly upsetting I must say
Polite , efficient staff . Nice breakfast . Security checks were quick but the food in the undercroft bar was awful .
Food could be better
how to improve: semi-flexible tickets that are much cheaper!
More space at check-in..it gets like a cattle market .

Always good and reliable quality of service . Toilets/washrooms sometimes disappointing and meals in Standard Magnum much below standard of Leisure Select . However I understand the approach and comparability of the meals with Supergo
Cheap flexible tickets. Same day cheap standby tickets.
Food is really weak . I dont know anyone who would wish to eat the fish dish today . This really has to be fixed . Staff super nice as always .
It would be great to have ticket at a reasonable price not only 3 months in advance...
The Quasigo train was very dirty and tatty- about time for some refurbishment ! Also prices for food/drink on board were excessive . Cheaper catering needed .
Have a better meal on standard magnum
Maybe a less rushed meal with an offer of another drink rather than be served tea or coffee so soon

It was my first time travelling with Quasigo . It 's much more convenient than the plane and has proved be quicker . Great customer service . However , on board food is v.unhealthy and overpriced for what it is .

Staff were friendly when I purchased @ the bar and helpful when answered efficiently about connections and information about the route. Improvment: maybe to be able to put ticket on my smartphone as I could only print ticket.

Sell better food . I 'm hungry and all you have to sell me is low quality , bad sandwiches , wraps and toasties at unbelievably high prices . I decided to wait till Stars Bridge and I will eat there .
Better food in the lounge . More magazines in the lounge .
I miss the Leisure Magnum class . The snack in your Standard Magnum class is ridiculous , no more pre-dinner drink , it has become cheap .

Complete lack of customer service between Stars Bridge and Sunnyport . No drinks and no snacks offered which I thought was very poor . This is the complete opposite of what I experienced when I left St . Helen this morning . Customer service was very good .
Check in queues were too long today . The food was very mediocre . The rolling stock is looking tired .
Allow fully flexible economy tickets or allow different classes to be combined on the same booking. E.g. Non-flexible economy outbound and business return
Staff service is efficient , food offered is not as good as before . Toilet tissue quality is famously bad . However , people need Quasigo train services .
Really poor to have stopped serving a hot meal in standard magnum especially given ticket price increase
Bigger portion of food and more food selection in the lounges
Because we are satisfied . The food can be improved , there was no choice between warm and cold dishes on the train . Thx .
Reinstate a decent breakfast in standard magnum or give us the option to pay for a better meal
I 'm not sure that you could improve . Your spanish staff are rude and arrogant . the food is sub standard . Zero value for money . Complete rip off .
Allow name changes on tickets. You don't even check anyway!!
It would be good to have onboard wifi and better food in the buffet car .
The food is very average
Better food and simple first aid kit at Stars Bridge station
Slightly cheaper tickets, offers on 1st class travel for leisure travellers. Help when booking seats so as many as possible can be spaced out/not next to another passenger
Food is bad very bad
Seating could be more comfortable . Absolutely no space if sitting across from someone who is "large " or tall .
Great . Like having waiting lounges a lot . Possibly would be useful to have on ticket that you ca n't get in before a certain time . And vegan food would be awesome .
The seats in business class are quite shabby the food is average although the customer service on the train is very good
Fresher not warmed up food in the dining car .
The seats needs to be repaired , toilets cleaned and the food and drink available on board was terrible
Very efficient and effective service . More variety of food at buffet car would improve service .
The "meal " u offer in standard magnum is rather mean & unimaginative . It could do with a little more substance & innovation ! AK
Meal served did not accord with menu provided ( different starter ) ; need power supply at every seat in business ; otherwise fine .
Wifi in standard class. Solo seats in standard class. cheaper standard tickets on friday
Quasigo is filthy and horrible . The food in all classes is execrable and the seats are stunningly uncomfortable .

I Love that it is a train . I just think it is too expensive . Have you thought using the iPhone instead of printing tickets ? And putting connections for Russian and English ? Also , the food is finished too early , more food ! ! :-) finally , can you let DVD players ? Thanks ! Good luck !

Food options within the check in zone have room for improvement , not happy with changes to carte blanche system and taxi service through Quasigo not available last time I checked although mentioned on website ...
Improve the food that you offer ! Would be great
As I mentioned earlier service was very good most attentive , food not great , and Terminal in Stars Bridge is really dirty .
Overall very good, no problems . Of course ticket prices can sometimes be too expensive.
I rate it highly just because it's very practical for me at the moment, it's quick and the trains are pleasant. FREE WIFI PLEASE! (and cheaper tickets at shorter notice)

Food on the train is awful , too many plastic glasses and plastic bottles , tea cups too small . Checkin in and doing security and passport control at Sunnyport is shockingly bad , whole terminal is third world .

There was no one at Sunnyport who seemed interested in offering any help or adviceThe leg room on the trains is a lot less than the Quicksun service by Unigo which made for an uncomfortable start and end to our journey
Better food selection
Cheaper snack prices and more choice of food
More flexible tickets please and access to the lounge for premium standard tickets
Expensive in comparison to other travel options .Expensive on-board snack items .Ecomony seats not very comfortableGenerally a very average travel experience
Increase leg room
Service ok , but nothing remarkable . Queues too long for something to eat at St Peter , then no hot food on the train . That 's not service i would particularly reconmend to others .
Time for the trains to be updated and the food improved !
Better food , more news papers/magazines , better organization in controlling the passports in Stars Bridge
The table seats could do with more legroom . Generally very good though .

You need to be more flexible in terms of change of ticket even if not flexible. It happens to me many times I had to change to buy a new ticket because you would not change it my reasons were quite valid
Generally a fantastic service but on this occasion our meal was not delivered with a smile . We would also welcome back the hot meal in leisure select
Improvements in food are greatly needed , like it used to be a couple of years ago
Infact , I so dislike the standard magnum food service I 'm going to start using the plane again .
A trolley serving coffee tea and snacks would be a welcome addition to the economy section .
Disappointed with the amount of legroom compared with other trains but probably not much you can do about that now !
Have longer opening hours on the phone lines or be able to change semi flexible tickets online...
More choice of food and drink .
Selling cheaper tickets and more space seating for people having long legs
Hot food in premier plz .
Catering is aweful . The facilities at st peter are horrible . There 's no normal food anywhere ..... + its way too warm inside . Thanks bye
I would give a 10, but tickets are too expensive

Security staff always polite and very patient . I already recommend Quasigo to anyone going to Narnia - comfortable , convenient , fast . Your staff are really friendly and kind . The food is awful though - any chance of something vaguely fresh ? Thank you
The food could be improved . Was basically inedible .
The only comment I have is the leg room in 2nd class is less than that of Thays trains and abit uncomfortable for someone of 187 cm .
Please improve the food - its poor ,limited and overpriced !
Overall it's a great service but you must make cheaper tickets available at the last minute - it would good business.
Food is very disappointing .
Very effcient . Food could be better with more choice .
The ticket machine always has problems and the stuff in the ticket office is not helpful at all they Are slow and at some point even told me that it is Quasigo's problem not hers
Bring WiFi to the main carriages . Lower the fares . Expand the meal options in the cafe car .
The food could be better in business and the trains are quite shabby and need refurbishment
I have travelled on Quasigo since it started and always had excellent service . Only comment is your food has changed in standard magnum class .
Chaotic check in at Moonport . very slow . Veggie meal too small .

I travel with Quasigo a lot from Stars Bridge to Moonport and I love the service - a couple of tiny things - who chooses the Savory snacks in the waiting room in Moonport - horrible - also the Internet there is always tricky - are there plans to out Internet on the train ? Breakfast - Stars Bridge to Moonport is usually good but dinner can be very hit or miss Is it possible to always get a specific type of seat as a regular business user ?
Delayed once again tonight ; nobody is seemingly able to tell the truth about delay times . Food slightly better but still mediocre .
You could open the ticket office earlier
Best way from Stars Bridge to Moonport . Bad food .
More cheap tickets deals at odd moments, not just when booked in advance
Better than flying . Usually punctual ( but not tonight ) . Need wifi internet access though . And better food choices .

It 's still the best way to get to Moonport . And I enjoyed the duo club experience . The staff are always friendly and courteous . Food choice is sometimes weird . It would make a BIG difference to have reliable wifi or phone signal ... Can't even send you this message !
Service is ok , food is as always not good . Yesterday leaving Stars Bridge we more than a hour delay . Not Quasigo's fault but I arrive in Moonport very very late .
Generally a good service with staff very professional . Food could be better .

There 's less reason to travel standard magnum than there used to be . It remains a great service , but why pay the extra when the food is so much less impressive than it used to be ? Staff were excellent .
Lower the price of the tickets.-possibility to close the lights in the morning train.

+ Smiling and courteous staff. Clean toilets. Efficient processing. Good signage. - Ticket was expensive. Passageway within train too narrow for people to get through with luggage, limited luggage space so would not recommend if travelling with large

The staff is very friendly but I always travel in first class and have noticed some changes . I wished the food would be more consistant in terms of quantity as the portions are getting rather smaller each time . Also there is no more champagne on offer ! The timetable is not always accurate as the train is often very late .

Meal needs to be improved in Standard Magnum . I have travelled from Troy today and the meal on this train is the only opportunity I have had to eat . It was not sufficient . If you are serious on trains being used for journeys such as Troy - Sunnyport , this needs to be addressed soon . RegardsMH
Food is getting worse and worse . It used to be good 3 years back . Price are going up . . . .
Poor food . Poor facilities at St Peter . Good comfort on train . Polite and helpful personnel .
print at home tickets take up too much paper and ink. I need them to get disc on train to Moonport. Stars Bridge Waiting room is not big enough for people in full train.
Return to the high standard set in Leisure Select . Food is very poor now .
Better and cheaper food on the train needed ...no enough options and no enough French products

Seating is very cramped - my journey has been very uncomfortable with the person next to me taking up most of the space we have . The check in procedure at Frownville station was unclear and the staff not very helpful to passengers asking for assistance . It is a good service from Globetown to Stars Bridge but would improve with more seating space and friendlier staff at Stars Bridge
The trip was good, but it would be easier for me to be on time if the tickets listed boarding time as well as departure time
You could improve by bringuing food closer to me
Better vegetarian food - I use the Quasigo once or twice a month and always get the same bland tasteless food . Especially in the evenings ( in Magnum )
It is a great service - but the food is poor and we almost missed the train from Moonport due to v large queues at security and no way of telling anyone .

There should be a choice of meal in standard magnum . Neither myself nor my partner liked any of the 3 dishes given to us . Also fresh coffee is nicer than instant coffee . The toilets were very dirty too . Otherwise an enjoyable journey
seats are too small and not enough space ...
Accepting tickets on the Blackberry would be great. Thank you!
Hot meal on all trips otherwise very good service
No considerations for the needs of passengers with small children , food and beverage ridiculously expensive , toilet hygiene non existing !
service is great , only comment I can make is the legroom in the train itself apart from that everything is great
More legroom in standard class good speaking announcers wIth clear voices
Times ok, personnel and service ok, tickets not cheap.
The only fault with Quasigo is the price of snacks in the bar-car ! And would be great to have WiFi ! Will be taking the train to Moonport in 2 weeks and on to Stars Bridge . I LOVE it !
Tickets always very expensive. Not enough special deals. You used to have more a few years back.
Food in resto seems to have gone downhill . Please improve
Reduce ticket prices
The food was very bad . To Moonport it was a stale croissant and to Stars Bridge there was more food , but it tasted aweful !
No real complaints . Good service in the buffet car but perhaps more choice of hot food would be nice .
Introduce a season ticket for weekly travellers
Hot snacks would be an improvement as opposed to cold buffet items
Improve the food , its cold and boring
Too long internet tickets: 4 pages!
There wasn't any proper food in the lounge , poor selection of English mags and papers , have snacks available , free WiFi on board , bigger mugs for tea and coffee .
Security staff not friendly. Quasigo can offer better food better Internet and better facilities. And make money !
Great smooth & efficient service . Prices are quite high on tickets and food though . Staff were all happy & friendly . We had a great trip .
More child friendly meal options
Excellent service and journey . Food could be better .
Standard magnum food portions are absurdly and insultingly small . I had two pieces of chicken 1.d cms long . Not effective economy
The kiosk food is mediocre and overpriced . The interior of the train could be modernised
Food is really poor . Lets the rest of the service down .
Thanks , micro announcements from the train manager much too long and loud . Food too fat and heavy and not enough vegetables/fruit , otherwise great .
Seats need to be more comfortable and it would be better if there were staff walking around selling snacks .
Service and staff very good . However the meals were not good dishes . What happened to the hot food ?
Very good train on time just needs more large luggage space people nice

For a big company , the food sold in the buffet is sub standard . There should be a proper expresso machine , not that horrible nespresso , good english tea and real milk , not fake prepackaged junk . Also concern about the environment . Hope thishelps .

Food not brilliant and when we reached front of queue they had run out of what we wanted . Girl at counter tried elsewhere on train fir what we wanted , said they hadnt so we chose something else . Then suddenly said they had what we wanted after all but by then it was too late . Girl seemed surprised we didnt want two breakfasts !Apart from catering an enjoyable experience
Standard magnum is good value for money . Food is average ! Champagne very nice but wine selection poor - one bad chardeney , one horrible rose and three less than average reds .

Better queuing space in Stars Bridge between passport control and security . The space currently is too small and poorly organised so you have to wait longer as new people join the line from the sides after they clear passport . It makes people tense ! The same for the space in Frowntown . Other than that it beats flying every time !
I wd hav liked a vegan meal
10 cm more leg space in second class .
Reupholster seats as they are looking taty .Also need more leg room for tall persons . Thank you .
Healthier foods at the bar buffet . Bigger salads . Low fat sandwiches . The food choices are quite limted .

I had requested low fat dinner and was provided with a very mediocre vegetarian dinner . The food offering is in need of a serious improvement , currently it is a disgrace . Please also expand the meager seating facilities St Peter .
Food for lunch and dinner need to be improved
Very slow through security , little space to queue . Staff did open another scanner to help process the people faster . Otherwise efficient service as usual .
New updated train with more leg room would be nice
Better food , better web service

The trains are drab and badly lit . The decor is pretty depressing . The food on board is disgusting . I paid ן¿½200 for my ticket I just expected a bit more . The staff are helpful and always make sure i get through in time to get my train .
1- healthier food in the lounge and in the train , 2- less announcements during the train ride , 3- have quiet coaches and kid-friendly coaches
Spaces between seats are very narrow . Other things are perfect .
Not much leg room , or plugs/tables to work .
Food is a bit boring and more or less the same every journey
Food could be better : less carbs aa one does not burn calories ; or at least some choice . WiFi in train would be nice . As a whole , travel is more convenient compared to plane
Would be a plus if food was hot/warm in standard magnum
Journey was very straightforward , and good value when booked in advance . The costs of the onboard food/drinks were too high . Thanks
Bring back the nice food and welcome drink please .
Efficient service . Quick through security and check in . Staff could have been a bit more friendly though and leg room in standard class was quite poor
Not enough leg room
Meal is average on standard magnum would be ready to pay higher price for full dinner with hot meal then too much queue at customs 30 minutes waiting
Shame that the quality of food has suffered since leisure select became standard magnum . Apart from that all good otherwise . Nice staff and comfortable .
The food Is outrageously expensive and of awful quality - also , please provide better choice of healthy options .
Food was too fancy for us & toilet floor dirty .
Could I have free tickets please ? Better food would be good , better taxi service at the other end , better charging for electronics
Do n't like the new food . .
Service food depends on who it is some better then others But still best way to travel compatible to plane

The e - tickets weren't entirely straightforward with the scanners and it wasn't very comfortable inside the waiting area . Phone charging points and better food on train would be good , but generally a smooth and hassle - free journey .
There is not enough space for luggage . I frequently travel on the bullet train in Narnia which is better .

Member of staff who helped rebook my tickets was very friendly and helpful . Much appreciated . I would like much more legroom on Quasigo train . I 'm 6ft 5 and cannot sit comfortably . The international train ( not traintop ) has more than sufficient room . That has been the same for years and needs improvement . Kind regards
More child friendly . In Magnum there is no food for kids and the food proposed is not child friendly . Magazines for children as well .

Improve the space and customer service experience at Frowntown . Do n't let people not required to be in a queue , queue up and waste others time .This weekend 's mess could 've been simply avoided should you had placed three employees bfr chk in who should go 2 chk in and who should n't . Instead you wasted individuals time and constantly announced msgs people hardly adhered to.as a mass transit provider u should know effective crowd control , NOT ANNOUNCEMENTS
List of available meals and snacks
Almost confortable except luggage space . Best regards
Food in Standard Magnum is really poor .
More suitcase space .

Service was good but food was awful . Coliflower with no taste , cold quiche terrible and coffee gelatine thing ...the level is far away from few years ago . Very disapointing . Won't travel in 1st class next time .
too little baggage space on trains . Not enough seating at Stars Bridge and not enough ladies toilets at Stars Bridge .
Was expecting food to be more substantial in standard magnum . Service was excellent .
quality of food could be much better .

Mostly excellent but food in standard magnum was not as good as expected - expected slightly more and quiche was bland . Please consider an adults only quiet coach - would pay extra for that ! Otherwise , excellent

Better at reception-Stars Bridge needs to improve ; not enough space ;often long queu - lounge : coffee machines not always working ; variation and quality of food ; not enough seats ...hope this can help . Thanks
make more offers for cheaper tickets
quality of food and drinks at the bar are very low standard compared to what we should expect of a trip experience to be delivered by a train company in 2012 .
Stars Bridge Quasigo terminal too hot & too small . More space and better air-conditioning would make a lot of difference
V good exp at security with pushchair - baby allowed to sleep , etc . Would welcome extra luggage space and/or priority boarding for pushchairs .
Excellent . Slightly more leg room in 2nd class .
Service is good . Food on premium eco has got worse over the years . Not sure why . Magazine selection too French . Otherwise still very good .

It is the quickest , easiest ,most relaxing way to travel , city to city , very few delays and only 20 to 30 mins before check in so perfect . The tickets are expensive and the food is terrible and very little of it , should really be improved . Service is good , friendly .
I think the service is great , however I would like a smoking area and the drinks and food are just too expensive
Cleaner interior and better food/drinks selection

All of the staff were very helpful , polite and smiling . Such a refreshing change from Frowntown airports . However , could do with more legroom on the train , as well as electricity points to charge laptop .
Child meal not suitable

Appalling crush to board train . Total chaos . Absolutely ruins the notion of a leisurely trip . Insufficient shopping opportunities once through security . Little leg room in our seats . But good meal and smooth ride .
Ticket Prices are too high , quality an diversity of food limited but punctuality and organisation are good
Quasigo is fab , the only thing I would say is you do not seem to offer any vegetarian food options in the cafe
Improve the food
Offer a wider variety of food and snacks . Provide WiFi service . Otherwise a superb service . Thanks

Quasigo is very relaxing and easy way to travel to continent . Food and drink quality and quantity has declined over time . Service was a bit stressed out today due to busy holiday travel . Otherwise no issues at all . Thanks for the service all these years .
Choice of meal not available by the time cart got to me
Please decrease your prices and make all tickets exchangeable and refundable ! !
You could bring back champagne and hot meals in leisure select
For me , you could make it much easier to order vegetarian food when booking first class .
Please improve boarding Stars Bridge n lower the price of ticket
It's conviniant and runs on time . Seating and food can be improved
It would be nice to have a better choice of bread with the meal . I have never been offered a choice which includes wholemeal bread . Apart from that everything was fine .
Please modernize the train and make some space in seats . I'm 185 cm tall and I feel like I'm squashed into a tin can . Not a nice feeling to be felt for 2 hours .
It could be improved by adding free Internet access and making the portions of the meals larger .
Name changes on tickets should be allowed for a fee. Allocated carriages on certain trains for people travelling with dogs. If this were allowed I would travel on a fortnightly basis.
Good travel , expensive prices , very polite staff . Prices at the food bar are a bit expensive
Food was good , just looked awful ! White wine luke warm . Other than that , everything great .
- more organization in the lounge areas for each train indicate where to seat left or right, the tickets are not always checked at the gates.
Food could be a bit better in standard leisure . I like travelling by Quasigo . You should have more connections into europe . Would choose you over fllying ...
